metadata.title: CVE-2024-10086 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was identified in Consul and Consul Enterprise such thatthe server response did not explicitly set a Content-Type HTTP header,allowing user-provided inputs to be misinterpreted and lead to reflectedXSS.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
